Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli, Listeria monocytogenes, Salmonella typhimurium, Streptococcus pyogenes
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed in the liver, kidney, gall bladder, testis, ovary and male and femae reproductive tracts. Expressed in the ovarian stroma and the theca and granulosa layers of the ovarian follicle. Detected in the theca and granulosa layers of the ovarian follicle in the white follicle (WF), F1, F3, F5, and postovulatory follicle stages. Induction

Literature.Author: Subedi K, Isobe N, Nishibori M, Yoshimura Y.
